definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

sentences.english: Be how big lockjaw occurrence probability?
sentences.chinese: 破伤风发生的几率有多大？

sentences.english: The commercially supplied horse anti-tetanus toxoid serum was used satisfactorily.
sentences.chinese: 市售马抗破伤风血清经标记后效果满意。

sentences.english: We need to treat you with tetanus vaccine and antivenin immediately.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要马上给你注射破伤风疫苗和抗蛇毒血清。

sentences.english: Adults should be vaccinated against tetanus every 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 成年人应每隔十年接种一次破伤风疫苗。

sentences.english: Finally the immunogenicity of tetanus toxoid encapsulated in the microspheres was evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 最后评价了载破伤风类毒素微球的免疫效果。

sentences.english: Bacteria that live in the soil may produce tetanus (lockjaw).
sentences.chinese: 生存于土壤中的细菌可引起破伤风。

sentences.english: Doctors suggest getting a  tetanus vaccination every ten years.
sentences.chinese: 医生建议破伤风疫苗要每十年注射一次。

sentences.english: This paper reports 22 cases of tetanus neonatorum.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了22例新生儿破伤风患儿。

sentences.english: Have you had a tetanus shot recently?
sentences.chinese: 最近您打过破伤风针吗？

sentences.english: Objective Approach of result to large dose of diazepam to treat infantum tetanus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大剂量安定治疗新生儿破伤风效果。

sentences.english: Conclusions hemoperfusion with Charcoal kidney can effectively get rid the tetanospasmin out of blood.
sentences.chinese: 结论炭肾灌洗能有效清除血液中的破伤风毒素。

definition: epidemic encephalitis B (abbr. for 乙型腦炎|乙型脑炎[yi3 xing2 nao3 yan2])
